43 #include "StringUtils.hpp"
44 #include "GNSSconstants.hpp"
45 #include "SystemTime.hpp"
46 #include "CivilTime.hpp"
47 #include "GPSWeekSecond.hpp"
48 #include "GALWeekSecond.hpp"
49 #include "TimeString.hpp"
50 #include "Rinex3NavHeader.hpp"
51 #include "Rinex3NavStream.hpp"
52 
53 #include <iostream>
54 
55 using namespace gpstk::StringUtils;
56 using namespace std;
57 
58 namespace gpstk
59 {
60  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringVersion = "RINEX VERSION / TYPE";
61  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringRunBy = "PGM / RUN BY / DATE";
62  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringComment = "COMMENT";
63  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringIonoCorr = "IONOSPHERIC CORR";
64  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringTimeSysCorr = "TIME SYSTEM CORR";
65  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringLeapSeconds = "LEAP SECONDS";
66  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringCorrSysTime = "CORR TO SYSTEM TIME"; //R2.10GLO
67  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringDeltaUTC = "DELTA-UTC: A0,A1,T,W";//R2.11GPS
68  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringDUTC = "D-UTC A0,A1,T,W,S,U"; //R2.11GEO
69  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringIonAlpha = "ION ALPHA"; //R2.11
70  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringIonBeta = "ION BETA"; //R2.11
71  const string Rinex3NavHeader::stringEoH = "END OF HEADER";
72 
73  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
74  void Rinex3NavHeader::reallyGetRecord(FFStream& ffs)
75  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError, StringException)
76  {
77  Rinex3NavStream& strm = dynamic_cast<Rinex3NavStream&>(ffs);
78 
79  // if already read, just return
80  if(strm.headerRead == true) return;
81 
82  int i;
83  valid = 0;
84 
85  // clear out anything that was unsuccessfully read first
86  commentList.clear();
87 
88  while (!(valid & validEoH)) {
89  string line;
90  strm.formattedGetLine(line);
91  stripTrailing(line);
92 
93  if(line.length() == 0) continue;
94  else if(line.length() < 60 || line.length() > 80) {
95  FFStreamError e("Invalid line length");
96  GPSTK_THROW(e);
97  }
98 
99  string thisLabel(line, 60, 20);
100 
101  // following is huge if else else ... endif for each record type
102  if(thisLabel == stringVersion) { // "RINEX VERSION / TYPE"
103  version = asDouble(line.substr( 0,20));
104 
105  fileType = strip(line.substr(20,20));
106  if(version >= 3) { // ver 3
107  if(fileType[0] != 'N' && fileType[0] != 'n') {
108  FFStreamError e("File type is not NAVIGATION: " + fileType);
109  GPSTK_THROW(e);
110  }
111  fileSys = strip(line.substr(40,20)); // not in ver 2
112  setFileSystem(fileSys);
113  }
114  else { // ver 2
115  if(fileType[0] == 'N' || fileType[0] == 'n')
116  setFileSystem("G");
117  else if(fileType[0] == 'G' || fileType[0] == 'g')
118  setFileSystem("R");
119  else if(fileType[0] == 'H' || fileType[0] == 'h')
120  setFileSystem("S");
121  else {
122  FFStreamError e("Version 2 file type is invalid: " + fileType);
123  GPSTK_THROW(e);
124  }
125  }
126 
127  fileType = "NAVIGATION";
128  valid |= validVersion;
129  }
130 
131  else if(thisLabel == stringRunBy) { // "PGM / RUN BY / DATE"
132  fileProgram = strip(line.substr( 0,20));
133  fileAgency = strip(line.substr(20,20));
134  date = strip(line.substr(40,20)); // R2 may not have 'UTC' at end
135  valid |= validRunBy;
136  }
137 
138  else if(thisLabel == stringComment) { // "COMMENT"
139  commentList.push_back(strip(line.substr(0,60)));
140  valid |= validComment;
141  }
142 
143  else if(thisLabel == stringIonAlpha) { // GPS alpha "ION ALPHA" R2.11
144  IonoCorr ic("GPSA");
145  for(i=0; i < 4; i++)
146  ic.param[i] = for2doub(line.substr(2 + 12*i, 12));
147  mapIonoCorr[ic.asString()] = ic;
148  if(mapIonoCorr.find("GPSB") != mapIonoCorr.end())
149  valid |= validIonoCorrGPS;
150  }
151  else if(thisLabel == stringIonBeta) { // GPS beta "ION BETA" R2.11
152  IonoCorr ic("GPSB");
153  for(i=0; i < 4; i++)
154  ic.param[i] = for2doub(line.substr(2 + 12*i, 12));
155  mapIonoCorr[ic.asString()] = ic;
156  if(mapIonoCorr.find("GPSA") != mapIonoCorr.end())
157  valid |= validIonoCorrGPS;
158  }
159  else if(thisLabel == stringIonoCorr) { // "IONOSPHERIC CORR"
160  IonoCorr ic;
161  try { ic.fromString(strip(line.substr(0,4))); }
162  catch(Exception& e) {
163  FFStreamError fse(e.what());
164  GPSTK_THROW(e);
165  }
166  for(i=0; i < 4; i++)
167  ic.param[i] = for2doub(line.substr(5 + 12*i, 12));
168 
169  if(ic.type == IonoCorr::GAL) {
170  valid |= validIonoCorrGal;
171  }
172  else if(ic.type == IonoCorr::GPSA) {
173  if(mapIonoCorr.find("GPSB") != mapIonoCorr.end())
174  valid |= validIonoCorrGPS;
175  }
176  else if(ic.type == IonoCorr::GPSB) {
177  if(mapIonoCorr.find("GPSA") != mapIonoCorr.end())
178  valid |= validIonoCorrGPS;
179  }
180  //else
181  mapIonoCorr[ic.asString()] = ic;
182  }
183 
184  else if(thisLabel == stringDeltaUTC) { // "DELTA-UTC: A0,A1,T,W" R2.11 GPS
185  TimeSystemCorrection tc("GPUT");
186  tc.A0 = for2doub(line.substr(3,19));
187  tc.A1 = for2doub(line.substr(22,19));
188  tc.refSOW = asInt(line.substr(41,9));
189  tc.refWeek = asInt(line.substr(50,9));
190  tc.geoProvider = string(" ");
191  tc.geoUTCid = 0;
192 
193  mapTimeCorr[tc.asString4()] = tc;
194  valid |= validTimeSysCorr;
195  }
196  // R2.11 but Javad uses it in 3.01
197  else if(thisLabel == stringCorrSysTime) { // "CORR TO SYSTEM TIME" R2.10 GLO
198  TimeSystemCorrection tc("GLUT");
199  tc.refYr = asInt(line.substr(0,6));
200  tc.refMon = asInt(line.substr(6,6));
201  tc.refDay = asInt(line.substr(12,6));
202  tc.A0 = -for2doub(line.substr(21,19)); // -TauC
203 
204  // convert to week,sow
205  CivilTime ct(tc.refYr,tc.refMon,tc.refDay,0,0,0.0);
206  GPSWeekSecond gws(ct);
207  tc.refWeek = gws.week;
208  tc.refSOW = gws.sow;
209 
210  tc.A1 = 0.0;
211  tc.geoProvider = string(" ");
212  tc.geoUTCid = 3; // UTC(SU)
213 
214  mapTimeCorr[tc.asString4()] = tc;
215  valid |= validTimeSysCorr;
216  }
217  else if(thisLabel == stringDUTC) { // "D-UTC A0,A1,T,W,S,U" // R2.11 GEO
218  TimeSystemCorrection tc("SBUT");
219  tc.A0 = for2doub(line.substr(0,19));
220  tc.A1 = for2doub(line.substr(19,19));
221  tc.refSOW = asInt(line.substr(38,7));
222  tc.refWeek = asInt(line.substr(45,5));
223  tc.geoProvider = line.substr(51,5);
224  tc.geoUTCid = asInt(line.substr(57,2));
225 
226  mapTimeCorr[tc.asString4()] = tc;
227  valid |= validTimeSysCorr;
228  }
229  else if(thisLabel == stringTimeSysCorr) { // R3 only // "TIME SYSTEM CORR"
230  TimeSystemCorrection tc;
231  try { tc.fromString(strip(line.substr(0,4))); }
232  catch(Exception& e) {
233  FFStreamError fse(e.what());
234  GPSTK_THROW(e);
235  }
236 
237  tc.A0 = for2doub(line.substr(5,17));
238  tc.A1 = for2doub(line.substr(22,16));
239  tc.refSOW = asInt(line.substr(38,7));
240  tc.refWeek = asInt(line.substr(45,5));
241  tc.geoProvider = strip(line.substr(51,6));
242  tc.geoUTCid = asInt(line.substr(57,2));
243 
244  if(tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GLGP ||
245  tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GLUT || // TD ?
246  tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::BDUT || // TD ?
247  tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GPUT ||
248  tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GPGA ||
249  tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::QZGP ||
250  tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::QZUT)
251  {
252  GPSWeekSecond gws(tc.refWeek,tc.refSOW);
253  CivilTime ct(gws);
254  tc.refYr = ct.year;
255  tc.refMon = ct.month;
256  tc.refDay = ct.day;
257  }
258 
259  if(tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GAUT) {
260  GALWeekSecond gws(tc.refWeek,tc.refSOW);
261  CivilTime ct(gws);
262  tc.refYr = ct.year;
263  tc.refMon = ct.month;
264  tc.refDay = ct.day;
265  }
266 
267  //if(tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GLUT) {
268  // tc.refYr = 1980;
269  // tc.refMon = 1;
270  // tc.refDay = 6;
271  // tc.refWeek = 0;
272  // tc.refSOW = 0;
273  //}
274 
275  mapTimeCorr[tc.asString4()] = tc;
276  valid |= validTimeSysCorr;
277  }
278 
279  else if(thisLabel == stringLeapSeconds) { // "LEAP SECONDS"
280  leapSeconds = asInt(line.substr(0,6));
281  leapDelta = asInt(line.substr(6,6)); // R3 only
282  leapWeek = asInt(line.substr(12,6)); // R3 only
283  leapDay = asInt(line.substr(18,6)); // R3 only
284  valid |= validLeapSeconds;
285  }
286 
287  else if(thisLabel == stringEoH) { // "END OF HEADER"
288  valid |= validEoH;
289  }
290 
291  else {
292  throw(FFStreamError("Unknown header label >" + thisLabel + "< at line " +
293  asString<size_t>(strm.lineNumber)));
294  }
295  }
296 
297  unsigned long allValid;
298  if(version >= 3.0)
299  allValid = allValid3;
300  else if(version >= 2 && version < 3)
301  allValid = allValid2;
302  else {
303  FFStreamError e("Unknown or unsupported RINEX version "+asString(version,2));
304  GPSTK_THROW(e);
305  }
306 
307  if((allValid & valid) != allValid) {
308  FFStreamError e("Incomplete or invalid header");
309  GPSTK_THROW(e);
310  }
311 
312  strm.header = *this;
313  strm.headerRead = true;
314 
315  } // end of reallyGetRecord
316 
317  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
318  void Rinex3NavHeader::reallyPutRecord(FFStream& ffs) const
319  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError, StringException)
320  {
321  Rinex3NavStream& strm = dynamic_cast<Rinex3NavStream&>(ffs);
322 
323  strm.header = (*this);
324 
325  int j;
326  unsigned long allValid;
327  if(version >= 3.0)
328  allValid = allValid3;
329  else if(version >= 2 && version < 3)
330  allValid = allValid2;
331  else {
332  FFStreamError err("Unknown RINEX version: " + asString(version,4));
333  GPSTK_THROW(err);
334  }
335 
336  if((valid & allValid) != allValid) {
337  FFStreamError err("Incomplete or invalid header.");
338  GPSTK_THROW(err);
339  }
340 
341  string line;
342  if(valid & validVersion) { // "RINEX VERSION / TYPE"
343  line = rightJustify(asString(version,2), 10);
344  line += string(10, ' ');
345  line += leftJustify(fileType, 20);
346  if(version >= 3) line += leftJustify(fileSys,20);
347  else line += string(20,' ');
348  line += leftJustify(stringVersion,20);
349  strm << stripTrailing(line) << endl;
350  strm.lineNumber++;
351  }
352 
353  if(valid & validRunBy) { // "PGM / RUN BY / DATE"
354  line = leftJustify(fileProgram,20);
355  line += leftJustify(fileAgency ,20);
356  SystemTime sysTime;
357  string curDate = printTime(sysTime,"%04Y%02m%02d %02H%02M%02S UTC");
358  line += leftJustify(curDate, 20);
359  line += leftJustify(stringRunBy,20);
360  strm << stripTrailing(line) << endl;
361  strm.lineNumber++;
362  }
363 
364  if(valid & validComment) { // "COMMENT"
365  vector<string>::const_iterator itr = commentList.begin();
366  while (itr != commentList.end())
367  {
368  line = leftJustify((*itr), 60);
369  line += leftJustify(stringComment,20);
370  strm << stripTrailing(line) << endl;
371  strm.lineNumber++;
372  itr++;
373  }
374  }
375 
376  if(valid & validIonoCorrGPS) { // "IONOSPHERIC CORR"
377  map<string,IonoCorr>::const_iterator it;
378  for(it=mapIonoCorr.begin(); it != mapIonoCorr.end(); ++it) {
379  switch(it->second.type) {
380  case IonoCorr::GAL:
381  line = "GAL ";
382  for(j=0; j<3; j++)
383  line += doubleToScientific(it->second.param[j],12,4,2);
384  line += doubleToScientific(0.0,12,4,2);
385  line += string(7,' ');
386  line += leftJustify(stringIonoCorr,20);
387  break;
388  case IonoCorr::GPSA:
389  if(version >= 3) {
390  line = "GPSA ";
391  for(j=0; j<4; j++)
392  line += doubleToScientific(it->second.param[j],12,4,2);
393  line += string(7,' ');
394  line += leftJustify(stringIonoCorr,20);
395  }
396  else { // "ION ALPHA" // R2.11
397  line = " ";
398  for(j=0; j<4; j++)
399  line += doubleToScientific(it->second.param[j],12,4,2);
400  line += string(10,' ');
401  line += leftJustify(stringIonAlpha,20);
402  }
403  break;
404  case IonoCorr::GPSB:
405  if(version >= 3) {
406  line = "GPSB ";
407  for(j=0; j<4; j++)
408  line += doubleToScientific(it->second.param[j],12,4,2);
409  line += string(7,' ');
410  line += leftJustify(stringIonoCorr,20);
411  }
412  else { // "ION BETA" // R2.11
413  line = " ";
414  for(j=0; j<4; j++)
415  line += doubleToScientific(it->second.param[j],12,4,2);
416  line += string(10,' ');
417  line += leftJustify(stringIonBeta,20);
418  }
419  break;
420  }
421  strm << stripTrailing(line) << endl;
422  strm.lineNumber++;
423  }
424  }
425 
426  if(valid & validTimeSysCorr) { // "TIME SYSTEM CORR"
427  map<string,TimeSystemCorrection>::const_iterator it;
428  for(it=mapTimeCorr.begin(); it != mapTimeCorr.end(); ++it) {
429  const TimeSystemCorrection& tc(it->second);
430  if(version >= 3) {
431  line = tc.asString4() + " ";
432  line += doubleToScientific(tc.A0,17,10,2);
433  //if(tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GLUT
434  // || tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::GLGP)
435  // line += doubleToScientific(0.0,16,9,2);
436  //else
437  line += doubleToScientific(tc.A1,16,9,2);
438 
439  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refSOW),7);
440  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refWeek),5);
441 
442  if(tc.type == TimeSystemCorrection::SBUT) {
443  line += rightJustify(tc.geoProvider,6);
444  line += " ";
445  }
446  else
447  line += string(7,' ');
448 
449  line += rightJustify(asString<int>(tc.geoUTCid),2);
450  line += " ";
451 
452  line += leftJustify(stringTimeSysCorr,20);
453  }
454  else {
455  if(tc.asString4() == "GPUT") { // "DELTA-UTC: A0,A1,T,W" R2.11 GPS
456  line = " ";
457  line += doubleToScientific(tc.A0,19,12,2);
458  line += doubleToScientific(tc.A1,19,12,2);
459  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refSOW),9);
460  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refWeek),9);
461  line += " ";
462  line += leftJustify(stringDeltaUTC,20);
463  }
464  else if(tc.asString4() == "GLGP") { // "CORR TO SYSTEM TIME" R2.10 GLO
465  line = rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refYr),6);
466  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refMon),6);
467  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refDay),6);
468  line += doubleToScientific(tc.A0,19,12,2);
469  line += string(23,' ');
470  line += leftJustify(stringCorrSysTime,20);
471  }
472  else if(tc.asString4() == "SBUT") { // "D-UTC A0,A1,T,W,S,U" R2.11 GEO
473  line = doubleToScientific(tc.A0,19,12,2);
474  line += doubleToScientific(tc.A1,19,12,2);
475  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refSOW),7);
476  line += rightJustify(asString<long>(tc.refWeek),5);
477  line += rightJustify(tc.geoProvider,6);
478  line += " ";
479  line += rightJustify(asString<int>(tc.geoUTCid),2);
480  line += " ";
481  line += leftJustify(stringDUTC,20);
482  }
483  }
484 
485  strm << stripTrailing(line) << endl;
486  strm.lineNumber++;
487  }
488  }
489 
490  if(valid & validLeapSeconds) { // "LEAP SECONDS"
491  line = rightJustify(asString(leapSeconds),6);
492  if(version >= 3) { // ver 3
493  line += rightJustify(asString(leapDelta),6);
494  line += rightJustify(asString(leapWeek),6);
495  line += rightJustify(asString(leapDay),6);
496  line += string(36, ' ');
497  }
498  else // ver 2
499  line += string(54, ' ');
500  line += leftJustify(stringLeapSeconds,20);
501  strm << stripTrailing(line) << endl;
502  strm.lineNumber++;
503  }
504 
505  if(valid & validEoH) { // "END OF HEADER"
506  line = string(60,' ');
507  line += leftJustify(stringEoH,20);
508  strm << stripTrailing(line) << endl;
509  strm.lineNumber++;
510  }
511 
512  } // end of reallyPutRecord
513 
514  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
515  void Rinex3NavHeader::dump(ostream& s) const
516  {
517 
518  s << "---------------------------------- REQUIRED "
519  << "----------------------------------\n";
520 
521  s << "Rinex Version " << fixed << setw(5) << setprecision(2) << version
522  << ", File type " << fileType << ", System " << fileSys << ".\n";
523  s << "Prgm: " << fileProgram << ", Run: " << date << ", By: " << fileAgency
524  << endl;
525 
526  s << "(This header is ";
527  if(version >= 3 && (valid & allValid3) == allValid3)
528  s << "VALID RINEX version 3";
529  else if(version < 3 && (valid & allValid2) == allValid2)
530  s << "VALID RINEX version 2";
531  else s << "NOT VALID RINEX";
532  s << ")." << endl;
533 
534  if(!(valid & validVersion)) s << " Version is NOT valid\n";
535  if(!(valid & validRunBy )) s << " Run by is NOT valid\n";
536  if(!(valid & validEoH )) s << " End of Header is NOT valid\n";
537 
538  s << "---------------------------------- OPTIONAL "
539  << "----------------------------------\n";
540 
541  for(map<string,TimeSystemCorrection>::const_iterator tcit
542  = mapTimeCorr.begin(); tcit != mapTimeCorr.end(); ++tcit)
543  { tcit->second.dump(s); s << endl; }
544 
545  map<string,IonoCorr>::const_iterator icit;
546  for(icit=mapIonoCorr.begin(); icit != mapIonoCorr.end(); ++icit) {
547  s << "Iono correction for " << icit->second.asString() << " : "
548  << scientific << setprecision(4);
549  switch(icit->second.type) {
550  case IonoCorr::GAL: s << "ai0 = " << icit->second.param[0]
551  << ", ai1 = " << icit->second.param[1]
552  << ", ai2 = " << icit->second.param[2];
553  break;
554  case IonoCorr::GPSA: s << "alpha " << icit->second.param[0]
555  << " " << icit->second.param[1]
556  << " " << icit->second.param[2]
557  << " " << icit->second.param[3];
558  break;
559  case IonoCorr::GPSB: s << "beta " << icit->second.param[0]
560  << " " << icit->second.param[1]
561  << " " << icit->second.param[2]
562  << " " << icit->second.param[3];
563  break;
564  }
565  s << endl;
566  }
567 
568  if(valid & validLeapSeconds) {
569  s << "Leap seconds: " << leapSeconds;
570  if(leapDelta != 0) s << ", change " << leapDelta
571  << " at week " << leapWeek << ", day " << leapDay;
572  s << endl;
573  }
574  else s << " Leap seconds is NOT valid\n";
575 
576  if(commentList.size() > 0) {
577  s << "Comments (" << commentList.size() << ") :\n";
578  for(size_t i = 0; i < commentList.size(); i++)
579  s << commentList[i] << endl;
580  }
581 
582  s << "-------------------------------- END OF HEADER "
583  << "-------------------------------\n";
584 
585  } // end of dump
586 
587 } // namespace
Generated on Sat Mar 22 2014 12:56:48 for GPS ToolKit Software Library by   1.8.4
